sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Bestow one penny for the Lords sake. And buy this paper for the poor's sake. Place it over the poor's boxe, in your church or house, shop or inne, &c.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
Printed by Thomas Ratcliffe, and are to be sold at his house, near Doctors Commons, London : 1658.
With engraved illustrations representing the poor. Annotation on Thomason copy: "1658: Sept. 15." Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Printed by Thomas Ratcliffe, and are to be sold at his house, near Doctors Commons, London : 1658.
With engraved illustrations representing the poor. Annotation on Thomason copy: "1658: Sept. 15." Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Thomas Ratcliffe
his house, near Doctors Commons
